Within the [93mlimits[0m of [93mclassical[0m [93mcapillarity[0m and [93mspherical[0m [93mdemagnetization[0m, the [93mfield[0m [93mlowers[0m the [93mnucleation[0m [93mbarrier[0m and [93mdrives[0m the [93mdistribution[0m [93mtoward[0m [93msmaller[0m [93mparticles[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mresults[0m are [93mrobust[0m for [93mradii[0m above [[93mFormula[0m: [93msee[0m [93mtext[0m] [93mnm[0m ([[93mFormula[0m: [93msee[0m [93mtext[0m] [93matoms[0m). Below this [93mscale[0m [93mnon[0m-[93mextensive[0m [93meffects[0m [93mlikely[0m [93mdominate[0m, as [93mdiscussed[0m in [93mdetail[0m in [93mSupplementary[0m [93mInformation[0m. The [93mvalence[0m [93mradii[0m ([93mrval[0m) are [93malso[0m [93mdefined[0m and [93mdiscussed[0m. [93mValues[0m of [93mrear[0m and [93mrval[0m are [93mused[0m to [93mdepict[0m the [93melectron[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mdistribution[0m of the [93mhomonuclear[0m [93mdiatomic[0m [93mmolecules[0m of [93mgroups[0m [93m15[0m, [93m18[0m, and [93mtransition[0m-[93mmetal[0m [93matoms[0m, and [93mprovide[0m [93minsight[0m into the [93mcharacteristics[0m of these [93mmolecules[0m.
